content: **the year of hats is back this time featuring our latest yarn in the germantown line germantown dk 1 ** the year of dk hats will feature 12 free patterns using our favorite knitting techniques our first design the callisto hat by tommy knits features a tubular cast on beautiful xo cables and intricate crown decreases a pom pom tops it all off and a custom kw tag completes the look *buy a kit from our site 2 or ask for it at your favorite lys * **worthy of note** callisto is worked in the round from the bottom up after a tubular cast on a k1 p1 ribbing is worked to form the deep brim an x o cable pattern is worked for the body of the hat from written or charted instructions decreases are worked from charted or written instructions the beginning of the round is shifted on the first round of the decrease section **specifications yarn** kelbourne woolens germantown dk 100% wool 270 yds/100 gm skein 338 jade 1 skein **gauge** 28 sts and 38 rnds = 4 10 cm in cable pattern on larger needles after blocking **needles** 1 16 40 cm us 4 3 5 mm circular 1 16 40 cm us 6 4 00 mm circular 1 set us 6 4 00 mm dpns *check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary * **notions** stitch markers tapestry needle cable needle kelbourne woolens label sewing needle **size** 19 48 cm brim circumference unstretched 12 30 5 cm height brim unfolded **skills** tubular cast on working from charts cables 1 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/kelbourne-woolens-germantown-dk 2 https //kelbournewoolens com/products/year-of-dk-hats-kit-callisto
